name: 2021 IEEE PES General Meeting
content: We are excited to share that the 2021 IEEE Power & Energy Society General Meeting, taking place 25-29 July 2021, will be a fully virtual conference. This format will enable our more than 3,000 attendees to learn and connect through live and on demand sessions, creating opportunities for flexibility and convenience. The theme of the 2021 IEEE PES General Meeting is "Managing Energy Business During a Pandemic". The program will feature paper presentations, industry panels, tutorials, poster sessions, and more. Super Session topics include: Grid Resiliency Resource and Transmission Adequacy for Future Power System Grid Edge â€“ Devices, Control, Applications, and System Operation Impact of Climate Change on the Power Grid Late Breaking News Session
